name: Froggie (itch)
description:
Froggie is a 3D platformer where you can only jump to move around. Explore a world of wondrous floating islands and beautiful dancing flowers. Meet the grumpy bullfrogs and see new things by licking magic mushrooms.

We strongly recommend using an analog stick controller.

tip: Your jump is limited to 3 different distances depending on how long you hold the jump button.

This game is made by:

Touko Sokka - Programming and level design

Marko Leppänen - Programming

Noora Malmi - Graphics

Markus Makkonen - Graphics
